1   package org.lindbergframework.test.persistence.dao.oracle;
2   
3   import java.util.ArrayList;
4   import java.util.Date;
5   import java.util.List;
6   import java.util.Map;
7   
8   import org.lindbergframework.persistence.sql.SqlArg;
9   import org.lindbergframework.persistence.sql.SqlFunction;
10  import org.lindbergframework.test.persistence.dao.PersistTemplateDaoTest;
11  import org.lindbergframework.test.testBeans.Person;
12  
13  /**
14   * 
15   * @author Victor Lindberg
16   *
17   */
18  public class OraclePersistTemplateDaoTest extends PersistTemplateDaoTest{
19  	
20  	public OraclePersistTemplateDaoTest(){
21  		//
22  	}
23  	
24  	public List<Person> listPersonsFromProcedure(String nick){
25  	       Map map = getPersistTemplate().callProcedure("queryPersonsFromProcedure", new SqlArg("pNick",nick));
26  	       return (List<Person>) map.get("persons");
27  		}
28  		
29  		public List<Person> out3PersonsFromProcedure(){
30  			Map map = getPersistTemplate().callProcedure("queryOut3PersonsFromProcedure");
31  			Person person = ((List<Person>) map.get("person")).get(0);
32  			Person person2 = ((List<Person>) map.get("person2")).get(0);
33  			Person person3 = ((List<Person>) map.get("person3")).get(0);
34  			
35  			List<Person> persons = new ArrayList<Person>();
36  			persons.add(person);
37  			persons.add(person2);
38  			persons.add(person3);
39  			
40  			return persons;
41  		}
42  		
43  		public List<Person> listPersonsFromFunction(String nick){
44  			Map map = getPersistTemplate().callFunction("queryPersonsFromFunction", new SqlArg("pnick",nick));
45  			List<Person> persons = (List<Person>) map.get("personsList");
46  			String strOut = (String) map.get("str");
47  			
48  			if (! persons.isEmpty())
49  			   persons.get(0).setNickname(strOut);
50  			
51  			return persons;
52  		}
53  		
54  		//TODO: Remove when the case sencitive problem is ok
55  		public void updatePersonNickNameBirthDateFromProcedure(int id, String nick, Date birthDate){
56  			getPersistTemplate().callProcedure("updatePersonNickNameBirthDateProcedure", SqlArg.get("pid", id),
57  					                                                                   SqlArg.get("pnickname", nick),
58  					   																   SqlArg.get("pbirth_date", birthDate));	
59  		}
60  			
61  		//TODO: Remove when the case sencitive problem is ok
62  		public Date updatePersonNickNameBirthDateFromFunction(int id, String nick, Date birthDate){
63  				Map map = getPersistTemplate().callFunction("updatePersonNickBirthDateFunction", SqlArg.get("pid", id),
64  						SqlArg.get("pnickname", nick),
65  						SqlArg.get("pbirth_date", birthDate));
66  				
67  				return (Date) map.get(SqlFunction.DEFAULT_RESULT_NAME);
68  		}
69  
70  }
